name: 2DPlatformer (SEE_W)
description:
This is my 2D Platformer Project,

Modification：

1）Remade the game map with a larger area and style.

2）New game mechanics have been added so that players have to follow the directions on the map and cannot return.

3）Added a new way of playing, using moving platforms.

Credits:

Created by Siyi Wang
